TheWomen's Long Sleeve Tops Lace Sleeve Loose Casual Spring V Neck Waffle Knit Tunic Blouse (blue color) strike a balance between style and comfort. The lace sleeves add a chic touch, but the loose fit might not suit everyone. The V-neck and waffle knit offer a casual yet trendy vibe, making it a versatile choice for my spring collection.

I live in Texas. In the summer the heat is brutal. I had some meetings with elite employees and needed a nice casual top that would be cool for afternoons on a patio, but also cover my arm tattoos for respect sake. This top fit the bill! I will say, my ink is black only. But it blended nicely into the pattern on the sleeves, and was very breathable. It feels like wearing a sleeveless shirt, and catches breezes nicely, but was still concealing the ink. I’m buying more in every color!
